text: Abraham in wun tanma-ah Pathian diang i-ngamna khan, amahi mi kadik eii tia Pathian in azoot, nuk-ah Abraham in wun itan khachu akadik mi eii tia injetna raliim kha eii. Khawa kha'n ajar eya wun katanmak inlei e-innum Pathian in kadik eii tia izoot khat-um Pathian diang kangamna rakip ngai Pa kha Abraham ejei. Inphut 17:10
